# validWidthRange

**Instance Property**

The range of widths allowed for an ink of this type.

## Declaration

```swift
var validWidthRange: ClosedRange<CGFloat> { get }
```

## Getting the width information

- **defaultWidth**: The default line width for the specified tool type.
